dct_description_sm: Shows Tierra del Fuego as an island.
Along bottom: Prima orbis circumnavigatio 1525. Secunda orbis circumnavigatio 1580. Tertia orbis circumnavigatio 1588. Quatra orbis circumnavigatio 1601.
Emblem above title cartouche: Wie Gaet Ick Keere".
Decorative cartouches, pictorial vignettes of cities, islands, and figures around border, descriptive text, rhumb lines, ports, ships, boating figures, sea monsters.
Portraits of explorers: Christophorus Columbus...; Americus Vesputius...; Ferdinandis Magellanus...; Franciscus Dracus...; Thomas Candish...; Olivarius.
Illustrations of inhabitants: Virginiani; Magellanici; Brasiliani; Magellanici; Virginiani; Chili; Brasiliani; Magellanici.
Inset map shows north pole: Polus Arcticus.
